titles: Plautus's comedies ... made English, with critical remarks upon each play.
author: Plautus, Titus Maccius.
Echard, Laurence, 1670?-1730.
publisher: Printed for Abel Swalle and T. Child ...,
notes: "To the ingenious translator" [i.e., L. Echard] signed: N. Tate.
Beginning-p. 84 is tightly bound in the filmed copy. Beginning-p. 95 photographed from Cambridge University Library and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
